name: The Soup Road
description:
The Humanology Museum is failing... and it's your job to save it!

Barter with 31 different post-human monsters with different needs and personalities!

Rack up money and journey to the end of the world, selling humanoid junk to beings who don't understand anything about humans!

Obtain the legendary item that will surely bring the eyes of the people back to the museum... the pinnacle of art, design, and culinary delight - The Dankbell's Soup Can!

CONTROLS: MOUSE1 only. Click during intro cutscene to speed up.

OBS: The file was changed slightly minutes after the first upload, due to a game-breaking bug that made the game unplayable. It was quickly fixed and edited!
